Pre-Game Insights: England won the most recent ODI series against New Zealand 3-1
New Zealand will be missing their talismanic captain Kane Williamson and lead bowler Tim Southee
Others: The match will start at 9:30am UK time
The match can be watched on Sky Sports Cricket and Main Event from 9am
Sky Sports customers can live stream the match via the Sky Go app
NOW can be streamed through a computer or apps found on most smart TVs, phones and consoles
You can listen to the match on BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra
Others (continued): England currently hold both the men’s ODI and T20 World titles
Joe Root is England’s top run scorer in the 2019 World Cup win and is a key player to watch
